Name: Sweet Sticky Choco Slime Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
This Chocolate Slime mount enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This Choco Slime mount enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
This Chocolate Slime mount enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed.
